description:
The always attractive Hampstead Shirt has a sustainable little secret—it's made from a blend of hemp and recycled hemp. This wonder crop delivers natural performance properties (quick drying and natural bacteria-resistance) as well as treading more lightly on our planet than conventional cotton.

Another thing they love about hemp is the way it gives fabrics such a light and earthy texture, something you'll enjoy about this shirt from the first wear. But what good is all that without good looks too? That's why this button up shirt is a (stylish) step up from your basic shirt, making it a winner all round.
name: Prana Hampstead LS - Standard - Mens
